name: Hixduraz
description:
Your a cat that can become a human, you can choose your Gender, you can choose your adventure, find Riches and Items along the way! Meet shopkeepers and Bosses visit endless amount of  islands Defend the ambushes, and own some OP items in game. Prove your worth in the beginning and fight 26 slimes till you level up.

Choose between Casual or Hardcore, In the land of Hixduraz it's up to you as the player to play as you wish carve your own adventure, Travel through a Whirlpool into a Twin world many adventures await you, many easter eggs and secrets are hidden deep within.
